meaning_str.bing:
v. 敦促；催促；力劝；鞭策
n. 冲动；强烈的欲望
网络. 鼓励；激励；强烈要求

催促；敦促；鼓励；力劝；驱策；恳求；激励；竭力主张；大力推荐；促进；推动；刺激；煽动；怂恿
强烈欲望；冲动；迫切需求；渴望；推动力；驱动力；迫切的愿望

1.en: We urge you to dream. Our Conference Planners will use their insight and expertise to help take your meeting to the next level.
1.cn: 请您想象一下。我们的会议规划者会议洞察力和专业知识帮助您解决一个又一个问题，最终将会议圆满的执行。

2.en: What beginners call gut feel is usually an urge to gamble, and I tell them they have no right to a gut feel.
2.cn: 新手的内心感觉就是赌博的冲动，我告诉他们，他们并没有权利谈自己的内心感觉。

3.en: Again we urge you to feel our presence around you. We shall continue to be with you in each moment. Good day.
3.cn: 再一次，我们催促你去感觉我们在你们周围的存在。我们将会继续在每一刻与你同在。祝美好的一天。

0.en: I don't have an urge to fling my waste.
0.cn: 我没有扔自己排泄物的冲动。

1.en: It's bad enough I had to give in to my urge to create a rigid schedule.
1.cn: 我没克制住冲动做了一个严格的时间表就已经够堕落了。

2.en: Bernadette's urge to shun, scowl or fling her waste at Priya is hard-wired into her DNA.
2.cn: 伯纳黛特想要躲避，发怒，或是用排泄物扔普丽娅的冲动是与生俱来的。

3.en: So, go get one. I can't just give in to every urge I have when I have it. That's why I have a rigid schedule.
3.cn: 那你就去买一个吃啊。我不能一有冲动就对自己妥协啊。这就是为什么我必须按表操课。

4.en: Gore Vidal once wrote that power is an end to itself, and the instinctive urge to prevail the most important single human trait.
4.cn: 戈尔·维达尔曾写道，权力是其自身的终结，而夺取胜利的本能冲动是人类最为重要的特性。

5.en: Detective, whatever your plans, I urge you to be discreet.
5.cn: 警探，不管你有何计划，一定要谨慎。

6.en: Sir, I urge you not to leave this room. Excuse me. Please.
6.cn: 先生，我建议您不要离开这间屋子。不好意思。请您考虑一下。

7.en: Your Majesty, I urge you to engage the Guardian with all haste.
7.cn: 国王陛下，恳请您即刻召唤守护者来保护大家。

8.en: And yet you can be in two places at once. I urge you to remain in Starfleet.
8.cn: 不过，你可以一人分饰两角了。我支持你继续留在星际舰队。

9.en: And predators had an uncontrollable biological urge to maim, and maul, and...
9.cn: 而食肉动物无法遏制的本能让他们捕猎，残杀，还有…

10.en: So I urge superman to come to this hill of the people tomorrow to see those who have suffered.
10.cn: 所以我呼吁超人明天来到国会山，来看看那些受苦的人们。

11.en: I can slip in and out, anywhere I like, you know. When I get the urge. HH Holmes. Murder Castle. But done right.
11.cn: 我可以随意出入我想去的任何地方，当我犯瘾时。HH·霍姆斯。谋杀城堡。但做得更好。

12.en: But the danger is, once we begin the rebels will not stop calling for retribution. Thirst for blood is a difficult urge to satisfy.
12.cn: 但是危险在于，一旦我们处死这些人，叛军们就停不下来了，杀人是会上瘾的。

13.en: And so I urge you all to wake up and to tune in and to influence the genomic revolution that's happening all around you. Thank you.
13.cn: 所以我强烈期望你们所有人醒悟并参与到这场发生在你们周围的基因革命。谢谢。

14.en: Listen, again, I want to urge you to push the duck special, because if they don't eat the duck, you're going to, and it's not very good.
14.cn: 听着，我要你们推销鸭肉特餐，因为如果客人不吃鸭肉，你们得吃，它不是很好吃。

15.en: So if you have any power or any say in what they do or how they use you, please, please, urge them to stop this war before it's too late.
15.cn: 所以，如果你对他们的行动，对他们如何利用你有说话权的话，求你，求你了，要求他们停止这场战争吧，现在还为时不晚。
